actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 to allow certain improvements on roads subject to frequent flooding.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to make contributions under the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 to raise the grade of any non-Federal- aid street, road, or highway damaged by flooding or high water after May 1, 1975, in a major disaster area in which future flooding or high water is reasonably foreseeable.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 to allow certain improvements on roads subject to frequent flooding.
